text:
There needs to be an element for allowing for think time. After a HTTP Request returns, the next 
HTTP Request is started.  This does not allow for realistic testing.

The timer should just be a 
number of seconds to wait, and allow for some randomness (as a percentage of the think time, with 
lower & upper limits - so if the think time is 10 seconds, and the limits are 50% & 150%, it would wait 
for between 5 and 15 seconds).
creator: timothyreaves@westfieldgrp.com
mstover1@apache.org
text: There are timers in JMeter.  They do exactly what is described.
